imdb.plot outline: Fantar the Fantastic begins a downward spiral with his highly abusive magic and treatment of people. His true intention is to entertain, but his style offends the high council of magicians who decide to take away his magic. The results? High stakes. Drama. Action. And of course, hilarity.
imdb.title: Fantar the Fantastic
plot: _Fantar the Fantastic_ (qv) begins a downward spiral with his highly abusive magic and treatment of people. His true intention is to entertain, but his style offends the high council of magicians who decide to take away his magic. The results? High stakes. Drama. Action. And of course, hilarity.::Chris Moss
